title: The Intelligence - “The environment is clearly much more hostile from China’s perspective”—examining a five-year plan
summary:
Also on the daily podcast: covid-19 helps wealthy countries talk about death and the future of Singapore’s hawkersTHE PARTY’S Fifth Plenum sets out a five-year vision; we mine the plan for clues about how China views itself in the world—and how long Xi Jinping intends to lead.
The pandemic has the rich world thinking and talking about death in a way not seen since the second world war.
And an uncertain future for Singapore’s famed street-food hawkers.
